intro: Ternstroemia integerrima, commonly known as the smooth-leafed ternstroemia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Theaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, including countries such as Thailand, Vietnam, and Malaysia. The plant is characterized by its smooth, glossy leaves and small, white or pale yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests. The botanical features of Ternstroemia integerrima make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
